about_the_game:
Tear up the highway as Jimmy "Stitch" Munroe - teenage rebel and undead menace! Brought back to life after a mad scientist's experiment goes wrong, Stitch hits the road on the run from the cops trying to bag him and tag him. In this intense endless driving game, you'll need quick reflexes and a lead foot to stay one step ahead of the law!

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:

  • Master high-speed driving mechanics as you weave through traffic and navigate challenging procedurally generated roads

  • Keep the cops at bay while maintaining top speeds - the faster you drive, the higher your score multiplier

  • Use your devil-may-care to gain the upper hand - chug a cold one for a devastating speed boost or light up a cigarette to trigger bullet-time reflexes! If you're in a tight situation an emergency boost will help you escape!

  • Compete for glory on the local leaderboard and challenge your friends' high scores

  • Choose your challenge! The 'Braindead' easy mode is perfect for learning the ropes, or try 'Deathwish' mode - the ultimate challenge with enhanced score multipliers and an exclusive leaderboard badge!

DYNAMIC SYSTEMS:

  • A procedurally generated highway, no two runs are the same!

  • Adaptive difficulty increases the challenge the longer you survive

  • Dynamic traffic keeps you on your toes

  • The Cops are always on your tail, watch the distance meter or catch a view in your rearview to keep this thrilling chase going! 

BLAST YOUR EARDRUMS!

Rock out on the chase of your life with the face-melting riffs of JOYFUL TOY, and go apesh*t to North Korea's simian sensation: THE CONG! This exclusive high-octane soundtrack will keep the energy high and the intensity cranked to 11.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer, SteamOS 3.0+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3/Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Other Linux distributions should work if they support Vulkan/OpenGL
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or newer, SteamOS 3.0+
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with Vulkan 1.1 support and 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Other Linux distributions should work if they support Vulkan/OpenGL

name: Sixteen Undead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM and OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Drive Like Hell! A high-octane chase through the endless desert! Dodge cops, rock out and tear up the road as a stitched-up teenage Frankenstein!
